# Dementia

Dementia - PH515

## Requirements

[Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/) and [CWLTool](https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool#install)

## Configuration

Specify input dataset path in [Dementia-inputs.yml](Dementia-inputs.yml).

## Usage

Run: `cwltool Dementia.cwl Dementia-inputs.yml`

***

### Based on original definition developed by Evangelos Kontopantelis, Ivan Olier, Claire Planner, David Reeves, Darren M Ashcroft, Linda Gask, Tim Doran, Sioban Reilly
### Generated by [Phenoflow](https://kclhi.org/phenoflow).
